title: Lots of Kicky Things From Wayfair’s ‘Hashtag Home’ Line Are Up to 62 Percent Off
text:
17 items in this article 14 items on sale! Photo: Wayfair

Wayfair is getting a head start on their Labor Day sales with a bunch of discounts on furniture and home décor from their bright and modern Hashtag Home line. It’s relatively new, having just launched a couple of months ago, and right now, their mid-century-ish sofas, a tulip dining room table, colorful side tables, and more are up to 62 percent off.

Calvillo Anchill Mid Century Modern Loveseat $224 (was $280, now 20% off) $224 at Wayfair Buy

Bahia Left Hand Facing Sectional $800 (was $1,050, now 24% off) $800 at Wayfair Buy

Carlisa Groove Handle Wood 3 Drawer Chest $185 (was $300, now 38% off) $185 at Wayfair Buy

Collette Multi Blocks Throw Pillow $24 (was $61, now 61% off) $24 at Wayfair Buy

Wesley Reversible 2 Piece 100% Cotton Bath Sheet Set $46 (was $60, now 23% off) $46 at Wayfair Buy

description: There’s a bunch of furniture and home goods from Wayfair’s Hashtag Home line on sale right now for Labor Day, up to 62 percent off the list price, including midcentury-ish sofas, a tulip dining room table, and colorful side tables.
